title: Weekend Rewind
description:
The Padre Hotel presents Weekend Rewind with The Social Vibe. Boogie down on Friday and Saturday nights starting at 9pm in Prospect Lounge as turns up the tunes of the past and the present.

1st weekend - Throwback Dance Party - 80's & 90's mash-ups
2nd weekend - Throwback Dance Party - Millennium Dance Flashback
3rd weekend - Latin Dance Nights
4th weekend - Vinyl Only (Funk, 80's new wave, reggae, dance hall)

21+

banner_image.name: Padre_WeekendRewind_937x400
banner_image.alt: Teal and purple artwork of a girl and disco ball with text that reads Weekend Rewind

short_description: The Padre Hotel presents Weekend Rewind with The Social Vibe. Boogie down on Friday and Saturday nights in Prospect Lounge as turns up the tunes of the past and the present.
